Name: The Dunaway
Ingredients: 15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
History: Created in 2010 by Misty Kalkofen at Drink in Boston, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of The Dunaway contains 99 calories
